meanings.definition: To view or show in advance
meanings.sent1: I enjoy previewing movies before they come out.
meanings.sent2: She is previewing the new exhibit at the museum.
meanings.sent3: Previewing the surprise party made it hard to keep it a secret.
meanings.sent4: He was previewing his speech in front of the mirror.
meanings.sent5: The students were previewing the next chapter to prepare for the test.

meanings.definition: A showing of something before it is available to the public
meanings.sent1: The previewing of the new product generated a lot of excitement.
meanings.sent2: We attended the previewing of the upcoming fashion collection.
meanings.sent3: The previewing event had free snacks and drinks.
meanings.sent4: The previewing of the movie revealed some interesting plot twists.
meanings.sent5: I got a sneak peek at the previewing of the new video game.
